Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.io

Interface AbstractIO

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileIO, MemoryIO
public interface AbstractIO
extends AutoCloseable
Presents a view of an entity (SpiNNaker memory or a file on disk) as something like an IO-capable device.
Author:
Donal Fellows

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  AbstractIO.Seek
    The various positions that a seek(int,Seek) may be relative to.

  • Method Details

    • size

      int size()
      Returns:
      The size of the entire region of memory.

    • get

      AbstractIO get​(int slice) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Get a sub-region of this memory object. The index must be in range of the current region to be valid.
      Parameters:
      slice - A single index for a single byte of memory.
      Returns:
      The slice view of the byte.
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If something goes wrong
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of the range supported by this IO object.

    • get

      AbstractIO get​(Slice slice) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Get a sub-region of this memory object. The slice must be in range of the current region to be valid.
      Parameters:
      slice - A description of a contiguous slice of memory.
      Returns:
      The slice view of the chunk.
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If something goes wrong
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the indices are out of the range supported by this IO object.

    • isClosed

      boolean isClosed()
      Returns:
      whether the object has been closed.

    • flush

      void flush() throws IOException, ProcessException
      Flush any outstanding written data.
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If something goes wrong

    • seek

      default void seek​(int numBytes, AbstractIO.Seek whence) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Seek to a position within the region.
      Parameters:
      numBytes - Where to seek to relative to whence. (Note that this isn't the same concept as the address property; this still allows for the file region to be restricted by slice.)
      whence - Where the numBytes should be measured relative to.
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If something goes wrong

    • seek

      void seek​(int numBytes) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Seek to a position within the region.
      Parameters:
      numBytes - The absolute location within the region. (Note that this isn't the same concept as the address property; this still allows for the file region to be restricted by slice.)
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If something goes wrong

    • tell

      int tell() throws IOException, ProcessException
      Return the current position within the region relative to the start.
      Returns:
      the current offset
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If something goes wrong

    • getAddress

      int getAddress()
      Returns:
      the current absolute address within the region.

    • read

      default byte[] read() throws IOException, ProcessException
      Read the rest of the data.
      Returns:
      The bytes that have been read.
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If the read will be beyond the end of the region

    • read

      byte[] read​(Integer numBytes) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Read a number of bytes, or the rest of the data if numBytes is null or negative.
      Parameters:
      numBytes - The number of bytes to read. A null or a negative value means to read all the remaining bytes.
      Returns:
      The bytes that have been read.
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If the read will be beyond the end of the region

    • write

      int write​(byte[] data) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Write some data to the region.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to write
      Returns:
      The number of bytes written
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If the write will go over the end of the region

    • fill

      default void fill​(int value) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Fill the rest of the region with repeated data words.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to repeat
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If the amount of data to fill is more than the region

    • fill

      default void fill​(int value, int size) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Fill the next part of the region with repeated data words.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to repeat
      size - Number of bytes to fill from current position
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If the amount of data to fill is more than the region

    • fill

      default void fill​(int value, FillDataType type) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Fill the rest of the region with repeated data.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to repeat
      type - The type of the repeat value
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If the amount of data to fill is more than the region

    • fill

      void fill​(int value, Integer size, FillDataType type) throws IOException, ProcessException
      Fill the next part of the region with repeated data.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to repeat
      size - Number of bytes to fill from current position, or null to fill to the end
      type - The type of the repeat value
      Throws:
      ProcessException - If the communications with SpiNNaker fails
      IOException - If the amount of data to fill is more than the region

    • asInputStream

      default InputStream asInputStream()
      Get a view of this IO object as a Java input stream.
      Returns:
      The input stream.

    • asOutputStream

      default OutputStream asOutputStream()
      Get a view of this IO object as a Java input stream.
      Returns:
      The input stream.
